original_text: And great crowds gathered about him, so that he got into a boat and sat down. And the whole crowd stood on the beach.
korean_text: 큰 무리가 그에게로 모여 들거늘 예수께서 배에 올라가 앉으시고 온 무리는 해변에 서 있더니

sentences.original_text: And great crowds gathered about him,
so that he got into a boat
And the whole crowd stood on the beach.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 온 무리는 해변에 서 있었습니다.
